snippet: The Buffalo Bills suffered an early setback to their season: The talented young linebacker Kiko Alonso is likely to miss it because of a knee injury.
abstract: Buffalo Bills linebacker Kiko Alonso is likely to miss 2014-2015 NFL season with knee injury.
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Bills suffered an early setback to their season: The talented young linebacker Kiko Alonso is likely to miss it because of a knee injury.

headline.main: Bills’ Alonso Likely to Miss Season With Knee Injury
